ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

SuperCorners is a macOS application that enhances the built-in Hot Corners feature by adding more trigger zones along screen edges and enabling a wider range of actions. It allows users to launch applications, run scripts, open files, and execute system commands directly from these enhanced screen zones, boosting productivity.

WiFiAudioStreaming-Desktop is a Kotlin application that transforms your computer into a wireless audio transmitter or receiver. It enables streaming of your PC's internal audio to other devices on the local network, or receiving audio from them, with features like automatic discovery and configurable audio settings.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Jauth is a Go-based, single-binary reverse proxy that secures self-hosted applications with SSL/TLS encryption and flexible user authorization via SSH or Telegram. It simplifies access management with optional Single Sign-On (SSO) and minimal configuration, making it ideal for protecting web services.
